name: nextcloud-social
description: Nextcloud Social is a federated social media app using ActivityPub. It enables posts, follows, and interaction with other platforms like Mastodonâ€”all within the Nextcloud infrastructure.
features: ActivityPub federation: Connect with Mastodon, Pleroma, and other federated social networks.
Post creation: Share text, images, and links with followers on your timeline.
Follow system: Follow users on your instance or across the fediverse for content discovery.
Timeline feeds: View posts from followed users in chronological or filtered timelines.
Interactions: Like, boost, and reply to posts from your instance or federated networks.
Privacy controls: Set post visibility as public, followers-only, or direct messages.
Hashtag support: Tag posts with hashtags for discoverability and topic organization.
Notifications: Receive alerts for mentions, follows, and interactions with your posts.
Profile customization: Set avatar, bio, and header image for your social profile.
Media attachments: Share photos and videos with posts up to configured size limits.
Nextcloud integration: Unified authentication and interface within Nextcloud ecosystem.
Self-hosted control: Own your social media presence and data on your own infrastructure.
